website_summaries.verdict: Comfort and style at a budget-friendly price are offered by the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Lift Canvas Low Top. Many users praise the shoe's design, especially the platform sole. It also provides support, versatility, and a high-quality structure.On the other hand, the model is said to be painful to break in. Also, the sole is not very flexible due to its thickness. At $65, this shoe can be an excellent option for fashionistas looking for a unique version of the classic Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Low Top.
pros: The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Lift Canvas Low Top is comfortable, a lot of users have lauded
This shoe is available in several color options
It’s a budget-friendly model, with at least a couple of buyers thinking that it’s worth the price
Many wearers share that they love the platform sole of the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Lift Canvas Low Top
More than a handful of commenters impart that they get lots of compliments for the shoe
The sneaker goes with just about any outfit, a few purchasers have observed
Some reviewers reveal that the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Lift Canvas Low Top offers improved support compared to other Converse All Star kicks
Stylish, cool, super cute, feminine, and classy are the words that many buyers use in describing the shoe
Quite a few users say that they will recommend this model
The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Lift Canvas Low Top is of high quality, several wearers have confirmed
cons: More than a handful of commenters remark that the sneaker is stiff at first and needs to be broken in, resulting in blisters
A few purchasers complain that their heel constantly slips out of the shoe
This model is not very flexible due to the thick sole, several buyers have perceived
The sneaker looks clunky, some wearers have observed

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable
customer_reviews.text: First day , they blistered, but now they feel pretty good. Bulky, heavy feel but definitely looks cute with almost any outfit. Not exactly for walking the town but comfortable enough for a relaxing day.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These have become my new favorite pair of sneakers. They’re very comfortable, I love the way they look with either shorts or jeans! I normally wear a size 6 in sneakers, but I got a size 5.5 because I know converse is always a little big on me. These fit perfectly! They were really stiff at first, and it took a few times out to get them worn in, but that was to be expected with a more platform sole. Now that they’re broken in, they’re very comfy. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I wear classic black chucks all the time and wanted something a little different. I got them in black and white. They are way more comfortable than I expected. Wish the black ones came with white laces as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!! A MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I'm absolutely obsessed with these shoes! I wear women's size 5.5 but in Converse shoes I know I will need to go down a size so I ordered size 5. They fit like a dream! The platform makes these shoes even more awesome. Side note: if your a women's size 5.5, you can fit into a kids size 3. I buy kids size 3 in Converse and save some $$$$.
customer_reviews.author: DayT

customer_reviews.title: The superga platform sneakers fit much better and are lighter as well
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoes but I returned as too large and heavy. I am always a 7 but these were 1/2 to whole size to large. The superga platform sneakers fit much better and are lighter as well.
customer_reviews.author: obsessedamazon

customer_reviews.title: The sewing in the inside back of the shoes is defective.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes will tear up the heels of your feet. Something is wrong with the sewing on the back part of the shoe. I have many other Converse shoes, this has never happened before. The shoes are white and actually my heels left blood on the shoes in the back. Miserable. Only wore them for less than a half hour. Long enough to get to the airport, board my flight, landed, took the shoes off right away. Misery.
customer_reviews.author: cate

customer_reviews.title: These fit just like all converse fit
customer_reviews.text: These fit just like all converse fit; large. It's normal to go down a half size with all converse and these are no different. The color is not pure white. It's a slight vanilla color which is noticeable because the sole is white. I tried washing them with bleach but they're still off white. Very comfortable but of course they're less bendy than other converse due to the thick sole. I like them and will buy again in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: T. M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why they list UK size if they are selling them in the US - misleading information. Shoe size is 7.5 and they are huge! But I do have to admit they are beautiful...if that's the right size for you, go ahead and buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Ok Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I already own a pair of the original Converse chucks that I've had for about 3 or 4 years. Instantly with these I could tell the quality had gone severely downhill. So much so that a $65 pricetag is RIDICULOUS to the point of insulting. That said, I purchased mine barely used for roughly half the cost, and thank God I did. They aren't even worth that price. Yes they're cute, but they're hard and stiff and absolutely impossible to wear without some kind of cushioned insert. Converse gets a big thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Grunewald

customer_reviews.title: I love these sneakers but the SMELL is really funky
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers but the SMELL is really funky, I had to spray them with foot oder spray and leave them out this afternoon to try and get rid of the chemical stink
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is sooooo cute! And more importantly sooooo comfortable! There's actually memory foam on the inside and it's built for a really comfortable fit. Easy to walk in. I accidentally ordered the white/grey instead of white/white, but I'm so glad I did because it 's not really grey, it's silver! There's a little strip of silver on the side that's so pretty! Really cute and classy! I never write reviews, but I was so pleased with this purchase that I had to share!
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Runs a half size large
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I wear a size 8.5 regularly, or a size 9 if the shoe runs small. I ordered a 8.5 but they were so big. I had to return for an 8. I didn’t love the shoe laces they came with. I ended up going to the converse site and ordering regular ones for $3 (free shipping if you make an account). Much happier now! The shoe with the original shoe laces is the one on the left, the one I changed is the shoe on the right.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Love My Converse!
customer_reviews.text: I had been checking these out for a while now, both on Converse's website and at a store in the local mall (these look even better in person). I was waiting for a sale since I didn't really want to pay full price :) and I'm glad I waited and got them on Amazon. Great price so I bought these in white as well. As far as sizing, I went to the store to try these on the make sure they fit. I'm typically a size 9 to 9 1/2 and I got the 9 and they fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Platform Converse - Comfy - A little heavy - Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these! I knew they would be heavy, but honestly they are more comfortable than regular converse. They are really cushiony and adjust pretty well with the laces. The opening around your ankle is very wide and there is no padding around your heel. I reeeeally do recommend wearing ankle socks with them. Booties will leave you with blisters - ouch. Buy them + white ankle socks! They go with everything! A damp white washcloth cleans them up nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 8, it fits perfectly and so comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Stella Oh

customer_reviews.title: Great style, but heel wears out pretty quickly
customer_reviews.text: Great sneaker, just be aware the sole & heels don’t last as long as other Converse Chuck-style sneakers, hence the one-star off. I assume it’s due to the heel hitting striking pavement a little harder bc of the extra height. Not something I didn’t expect, but it is wearing out faster than I thought it would with wearing 1-2 days a week (I have the sole around the heel coming apart). This wouldn’t deter me from buying again as I love the style and look of the shoes ;) Just buying a pair more often than I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Flic

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not real.
customer_reviews.text: Warning: I think these are counterfeit. I have a pair I bought from converse and I ordered this pair for my bestie for Christmas. First off, the sizing is off, second the shoe’s tags and box are a little off. Returning to buy a legitimate pair.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne W

customer_reviews.title: The lenght runs small but width is tight
customer_reviews.text: I will probably be returning these. I normally wear a size 7, but I had these before and I know they run large. My last pair were a size 6, so that is what I ordered. This pair are very narrow in the toe area even though they said M ( for medium width) when I ordered them. They do not have an M on the shoe, so I'm not sure if they even are medium width. A larger size would be too long as my heel slips a little now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but too big
customer_reviews.text: They are super cute, comfortable, but a tad too large. I’m between sizes (womens 9 & 10) so it can be difficult for me to purchase sneakers online. I had a pair of converse years ago in high school that I adored but they rubbed the back of my heel raw so I thought airing on the larger size would be a smarter choice... I was wrong. That’s my fault though and not the sellers. If you’re between sizes, I’d recommend going down as opposed to up as the shoes will stretch some since they’re canvas.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Arch support and more!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so worried about buying these shoes because I had plantar fasciitis and was recovering by wearing shoes with high arches. These shoes are wonderful!! The padding on the sole is thick and forms around your arch. It's so comfortable to wear and I wear these every day for 10+ hours. I love that they're platforms because I don't even feel the ground as I walk. I would highly recommend buying these if you are in need of comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Maddy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: You get what you see :)
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! I was a little nervous about some of the reviews because some were saying to order a size up or down but I got them and they fit great! I'm a size 8.5 in women's with a narrow foot and ordered a regular pair and they still feel great on toes and sides as well. I wanted a pair of these for so long and got them at such a great price, thank you!!🖤
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin

customer_reviews.title: Sorry not sorry
customer_reviews.text: I listened to the other reviews that said they ran a little large I'm a 8.5M and I ordered the 8M which fit me perfect. They make my feet look really big and they are very heavy and uncomfortable to walk in. They also hurt and feel that they are going to rub my toes in the front and create a scar if I don't wear socks with them. If I had to do it over again I wouldn't buy these.
customer_reviews.author: ZN

customer_reviews.title: Size down but otherwise great!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite shoes now! Absolutely size down, though. I bought the black ones in an 8.5 which is my regular size. I didn't listen to the other reviews that said to size down because I have wide feet and figured I would be fine. I was wrong. They were huge! So be sure to size down. Other than that, I love the shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Price not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes!! Unfortunately they were a half size too big. I went to the UPS store to return them the next day so I could go ahead and purchase a smaller size. When I proceeded to check out to replace my shoes they were 17$ more than what I paid for. I am exchanging these for a smaller size, why do I have to pay more?
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Purchase a 1/2 size smaller than you usually wear (for women).
customer_reviews.text: Fits too large. It is a narrower shoe than most athletic shoes so I bought a 1/2 size larger to give me some space. It was crazy big. I then ordered my normal size and I was walking out of them. I now have 2 pair to return and somewhat fearful to order the third pair! Fingers crossed! I talked to our adult daughter about it and she confirmed that a 1/2 size smaller than your regular size is really the norm for this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Roberts

customer_reviews.title: but i hope once they are broken in they are fine. super cute
customer_reviews.text: got blisters from wearing these, but i hope once they are broken in they are fine. super cute otherwise
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: I love Converse
customer_reviews.text: I buy half sole inserts to go in my Converse, typically Dr.Scholls, and they fit incredibly well and support my high instep. I now have several pairs because I almost forget I have shoes on. Makes me feel like a kid playing without care!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs big!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! People weren’t lying when they said these run really big! I typically wear a size 6 in woman’s sneakers/shoes and I got theses in a size 5 and they were still really big even with socks I feel like I would need super thick socks but still felt like my heels were slipping out while walking.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. I usually wear size 10, but go up a size with Converse. I also usually have an few days of uncomfortableness because of my slightly wide feet, but I didn’t have any trouble at all with these! I wear these for approx 12 hour days at work (Nurse) and don’t have a problem. I do wear an arch support because I feel that these are a little “flat”.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, runs large
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8.5 (39 European) 99% of the time. After reading the reviews, I first ordered half size down, size 8, and they were too long. The 7.5 fits perfectly coupled with the Smartwool no show socks with cushion (the best!). Side note: I also ordered the same sneaker in the slip-on, lace-less version , and I prefer both the look and fit of this style with the laces. Excited to wear this summer!
customer_reviews.author: ELR

customer_reviews.title: Didn't need to size down
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant on making this purchase bc other reviewers suggested to go half a size down. Unfortunately there weren't sizes below 5 available. But I'm glad I decided to go for it anyways, bc they fit nicely! Initially when I walked the heel would slip a little, but for some reason they don't anymore (maybe it has to do with type of sock). The only thing I found odd was that the toe cap was a little dirty...which I cleaned off, but they should have been clean in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: My First pair of Chucks
customer_reviews.text: And they fit, and are comfy. The white does make your foot look larger. These are a size 7. I could have taken a 6 3/4 if they made that size. But I thought they would be too narrow in the foot bed and they are fine. This is also the platform version. Walked all day yesterday! no complaints. I may get them in another color!
customer_reviews.author: karen s

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe to give some height.
customer_reviews.text: Really like these shoes. I'm very petite and I was looking for a comfortable shoe with a platform. These fit everything I was looking for. However, if I don't tie the laces tight enough the back of my foot comes out of the shoe a little. It's not bad enough to return them though.
customer_reviews.author: K. B.

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfectly and have a soft sole!
customer_reviews.text: These look even better in person than they did online. I'm 5'4" and find that most shoes like Converse make me look even shorter and accentuate my thick ankles and knees. Lol. However, these seem to elongate my legs and I feel comfortable wearing them with dresses! Bonus: the sole is very soft and provides arch support (I have flat feet, so I really appreciate it).
customer_reviews.author: idreamofbeanie

customer_reviews.title: Color more coral than pink.
customer_reviews.text: Am giving four stars because color of these sneaks is not pink as pictured. I can hardly describe the color. It is more like coral. They are still fun but I was a bit disappointed with the initial unboxing. I would not have chosen this color. But is is okay and will be good for the fall.
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: They are cute
customer_reviews.text: You willl need an insole for arch support. All Converse seem to lack support. They are cute. I get compliments on them almost every time I wear them. I ordered two sizes, tried them on and sent the other back. I got size 9 and 10, which is what I usually wear depending on the shoe. The 10 worked for me. I tie them nice and snug, then they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: My first pair of converse!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these tennys they fit good they do not make my feet hurt I do wear socks with them where I normally don’t wear socks with tennis shoes they’re comfortable all day and super cute I love the height the platforms give me
customer_reviews.author: dlaw

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Exactly what I wanted and I absolutely adore them! As per usual with converse, they're a little big so I ordered a half size smaller than my normal shoe size and they're perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Debra B

customer_reviews.title: Size & Fit
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my shoes! However, I typically wear a size 7 and I had to buy a size 6 (a friend of mine did the same). Typically I tuck my shoe laces in & don't tie them. However, they were loose when I tried that but, with them being tied, they fit fine. Super CUTE!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany L.

customer_reviews.title: Same ‘ole Chuck! Stylish, as always!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these in 1993! Now my 14 year old loves them! She was so happy to get them for Christmas. I was so happy to pay almost $25 less through this seller, than any store. The heel is a TINY bit big, but overall great!
customer_reviews.author: Shep's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Really cute !!
customer_reviews.text: I like the heel height and they really look cute. So far comfy but a little stiff which is expected for a new converse! Tried walking in them for a couple of mins and felt fine. May blister so make sure to cover the back of the foot with some band aid if going for long walks! I followed reviews to go a half size down and it fits perfect! No more than half size down though! I’m normally a size 7 and got the 6.5.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Just can't recommend these
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone says, they run super big. I wear an 8 and even the 7.5 was too big. But at the same time they are narrow up in the toe box. Can't imagine what kind of foot model they used for these. Too bad because they're pretty cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazo

customer_reviews.title: I wear a 7-7. 5 in women’s and a ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7-7.5 in women’s and a size 7 in these fits perfectly. They have a slight platform but it doesn’t make them heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: A whole size too small, DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, shoes too small, my shoe size is always consistent especially with Converse. These are about a whole size too small. They get you with free shipping but then for returns you have to pay for shipping. Guess I learned my lesson. If it isn't shipping straight from an amazon warehouse DONT BUY FROM OTHER SELLERS.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Have to wait a while for them to break in as the thick platform makes these shoes slightly stiffer than other new shoes but they are really cute and durable. I’ve had them for 2 years now
customer_reviews.author: Sandra King

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: These are my first converses nice shoes good quality i am 71/2 M and I got 7 but if you have skinny feet go to 61/2 I probably could get that size but I think I would have problem with the width since they are a little bit narrow
customer_reviews.author: Leme

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Shoe
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE MY FAVORITE SHOES!!! They are super cute and I love the little twist to the traditional Converse with the platform base. It's subtle but makes the shoes stand out. Go buy them, they are everything you're hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe but buy 1 size down.
customer_reviews.text: These run a size bigger than the regular Converse All slStars. I usually wear a Converse 7.5 (Women's 9.5) and I had to order the 6.5 (Women's 8.5) for a good fit. Beyond that they are just like my usual beloved Chucks!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea G

customer_reviews.title: I love am platform
customer_reviews.text: This show was great sender sent the item swiftly. I will say it is a bit larger on my foot than expected but not too uncomfortable I would have gone down maybe a half size.
customer_reviews.author: LaVina Valentine

customer_reviews.title: runs a half size large
customer_reviews.text: The best shoe ever!!! converse went all out on this platform shoe. Just right for us shorties but not over the top. I need them in RED! They run a half size large so order accordingly. The shoe is classic and stylish. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Aniah

customer_reviews.title: Nice I will buy 2nd pair. Not sure if I need to go smaller.
customer_reviews.text: They run slightly bigger than they should. Your heal feels like its slipping out of the shoe when you are walking, I don't think getting a 1/2 size smaller is going to help. I am now breaking them in and I have to wear them with socks. I will know if I should get the next size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Converse is the Best
customer_reviews.text: Converse is really the only tennis shoe that fits my big feet comfortably. I can always depend on the shoe lasting a long time and the materials being durable.
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Perfect everyday shoe
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the fact that amazon sells half sizes. I got a 6.5 and the shoe feels perfect. I love the height the shoe gives me. It feels like I’m wearing regular converse
customer_reviews.author: Mary Antongiorgi

customer_reviews.title: Love the platform!!
customer_reviews.text: In love with these! My daughter ordered these for me for my birthday and I have had tons of compliments on them. LOVE the platform aspect of these! People have seen me post about them and when ahead and order them after seeing them. I also ordered them in black because why not? LOL
customer_reviews.author: Shelly C.

customer_reviews.title: Platform is more comfortable than other chucks
customer_reviews.text: Love these. More comfortable than other converse I’ve had. I followed what everyone said about them running big compared to other chucks and they’re perfecto.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Breen

customer_reviews.title: Platform Chuck Taylor’s
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter in law for Christmas. She loved them! Arrived on time, just as described, price was good. I will be ordering some for myself soon.
customer_reviews.author: Miss "T"

customer_reviews.title: Sized too large
customer_reviews.text: These are great looking sneakers but their is little to no cushioning in the footbed and even though I sized down the shoe still fits like a slipper. Sized too large.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Maria

customer_reviews.title: Cute but apparently for Narrow feet!
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute...but oddly tight for Converse. I'm usually a 6 in most Converse. I will keep them, but a little disappointed by the tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Shortipie

customer_reviews.title: they loosen up and are super comfy. I love how they are chunky
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are SOOOOO cute! Buyer beware: Get a whole size smaller than you usually get. I usually wear a size 9 but had to buy an 8. They fit a bit tight but after a few days, they loosen up and are super comfy. I love how they are chunky. I have a white and a black pair and wear them all the time I get a lot of compliments when I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: BearsGirl

customer_reviews.title: To big
customer_reviews.text: Ladies I wear a 7 1/2 in women’s shoes I recommend getting like a 6 or 6 1/2
customer_reviews.author: La’Sha

customer_reviews.title: These are not designed for all day walking.
customer_reviews.text: There is not much cushion to these shoes nor are they very flexible. I wear socks with them and that resolved any concerns I had but these are definitely not for all day walking. They are awesome looking casual shoes and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feel taller
customer_reviews.text: Backs slip and the other normal sole Chucks do not! I like em though, but gotta wear socks to avoid slippage on back heel. No arch support just like the others but I sure am taller!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: So comfy and fits just as expected! I usually wear 8-8.5 depending on the brand and I got an 8.5 because my feet are a little wider. These fit perfectly like a glove and are soooooo cute!
customer_reviews.author: undero

customer_reviews.title: They run big!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! If you read the reviews you will find out the sneakers run big! It is true! Buy them half a size smaller. I personally bought them one size smaller and I feel them a little tight..
customer_reviews.author: Florencia M.

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo cute 🖤
customer_reviews.text: They match with everything. Dress down dress up they looks good with everything I swear. The platform adds that little pizzazz. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Fatimah Lopez

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 6.5 and fits just right. A little narrow as most converse are but the xtra platform makes it so comfortable. It feels like I'm bouncing while walking.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha S.

customer_reviews.title: Lift your spirits with these LIFTS
customer_reviews.text: I’m usually a 9-9.5 and I got a 9 regular for women in the white, they are just slightly big, which is fine with me- so definitely stay in your regular size. I LOVE these shoes, super comfortable for long wear, I’ve gotten tons of compliments on them and they go with just about any outfit I’ve worn so far! Also, you can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Look Great, Fit Off
customer_reviews.text: Looks Great, Fit Bad Don’t know if it’s because I have always wore kid’s size (5) converses, and these are a Women’s size (7). Maybe I should’ve gotten a (6 1/2)
customer_reviews.author: NaKiasha Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: True brand. They are converse. Very cute. They run a half size big. I normally wear a 9.5 in tennis shoes, but needed a 9. They fit perfect. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kaden

customer_reviews.title: I'm a little taller!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband hates these, but I LOVE them!! He doesn't understand platforms because he isn't short like me. I'm glad I bought them!
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: I usually wear a 7.5 but went with a size 7 in these and they fit great.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes much better then the regular kind, the lift makes them more comfortable and girly. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy & Scot Mason

customer_reviews.title: and the 9 would have been fine. I will say
customer_reviews.text: I adore these Converse lift, but I wish I would have ordered half a size down. For reference I usually wear women's 9 1/2 to 10, depending on the shoe. I ordered a women's 9 1/2 in these, and the 9 would have been fine. I will say, as with all Cons, it's a little narrower in width, so if you have wide feet, just lace them a little looser, and they should be just fine. Overall, very happy with the Converse Lifts. :)
customer_reviews.author: Em Penny

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love Converse, have bought at least one pair every year. Usually they run small so I got my usual 9 which was a bit too big. No worries, that’s what socks are for.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I did return them only because I should have gotten a 5.5 (since all my converse are that size, but didn't realize till I checked). I do like how they look and they are comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a converse style like this all my life! The heel slips a bit. Not worth returning! Love them
customer_reviews.author: MegB

customer_reviews.title: Check sizing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the proper size, but they are a bit too big and sloppy. I matched them up to my other Converse sneakers and they are indeed roughly a half size bigger, which puts my pinky toe right on a seam and is irritating. I love Converse sneakers, I just wish they fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: I Am Me

customer_reviews.title: Such cute shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I am typically a size 7.5 but ordered half a size down because Converse tend to run a little big. They fit just right and look really good! A great casual shoe to have in your wardrobe. :)
customer_reviews.author: Irma

customer_reviews.title: They are surprisingly comfortable despite the platform
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 6.5 in converse (high and low tops) but these shoes run large and I ordered a 6.0. They are surprisingly comfortable despite the platform. The only issue I have is with the fit. I have to tie the laces pretty tight so my heel doesn’t rise up from the shoe, but the shoe goes with everything and is perfect for everyday so it doesn’t really bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love love thse
customer_reviews.text: Wore these on my 50th birthday. Yellow is my favorite color and these made my outfit pop! Love my Chuck!'s
customer_reviews.author: Jaycee

customer_reviews.title: Love these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I initially ordered a size 6.5, which turned out to be too small. I reordered them in a size 6, and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: ginny hage

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for this exact pair in size 7. I couldn't find them anywhere but here. I'm extremely glad about my shoes
customer_reviews.author: Danna V

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and great price. Fast shipping too. I really like the extra height from these cute shoes
customer_reviews.author: Kathy E

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sight
customer_reviews.text: Well I ordered half size smaller than I usually do in converses, and as expected the fit was quite tight, which is not comfortable on summer, especially on a days when you have to wear them all day. But I love the style so much, guess I’m going to wear them in autumn and for a short walks 😉
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: All in One Classy An Sassy Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Converse Platform Sneakers, are a excellent product that gives Women a classy but casual look.
customer_reviews.author: Quandra Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Odd fit
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing converse for at least 10 years. These don’t fit like a true converse shoe... odd shape and floppy fit. Hmmmm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, however they feel different than my converse high tops. They are not as soft and comfy. But very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Tt

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe, but came in a plastic bag, no box
customer_reviews.text: Cute but didn’t come in a box. They came in a plastic bag. So not white the sign of authenticity and now not sure if I can trust it.
customer_reviews.author: Mina G.

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are my go to :) I love the platform! I always get to many complements they go with everything, with a cute dress or with jeans or sweats .... Very comfortable. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: madelaine

customer_reviews.title: So far, love it
customer_reviews.text: Cute, fits good, great color. Keep getting compliments on them. I like the "platform", it's not high, but better than traditional flat converse on the feet/arches
customer_reviews.author: Sheri STambaugh

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE OF RETURN POLICY
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with return policy for this product. Cost more to return so now I have to keep same. NOT SATISFIED at all. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Bought usual Converse size despite reviewer suggestions
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure why a lot of reviewers are suggesting to size down, but I’m glad I ordered my usual size in Converse. These are super cute and surprising lighter than I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: H.T.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but just too big
customer_reviews.text: I'm an 8 in boots and a 7.5 in running shoes. I ordered 7.5 but they're a tad too long. Fit well everywhere else. I'm just going to send back and reorder in 7 M.
customer_reviews.author: Angela T

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed w yellow stains in white rubber
customer_reviews.text: Another try and the white base is yellow and had to return second pair so disappointing
customer_reviews.author: elissa

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: These made my feet look huge. I put them next to another pair of same size sneaker and they were quite a bit larger..
customer_reviews.author: PAWHOUSE

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO BIG!!
customer_reviews.text: Waaayyy Too big! Very disappointed. But I love the style! Make sure to go down like 2 maybe even 3 sizes below your actual size!
customer_reviews.author: Hey it’s Hosanna!

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable, they don’t bend with your foot
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but not comfortable at all, they don’t bend with your foot, they slap the ground when you walk, like a duck.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and stylish! Like them a lot. Little on the narrow for me. I will either go sockless or wear very thin no shows which I have plenty.
customer_reviews.author: Jan  S.

customer_reviews.title: Love my Converse
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 6 in shoes and based on the reviews, I ordered a whole size down and they still fit a bit loose. Not the most comfortable to walk in for hours.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, get smaller size
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes, you’re going to want to get a half size smaller. I always wear a 7.5, I ordered a 7 and they fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GET THEM NOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was hoping for. So cute!!! I'm normally a size 6.5 (rarely a 7) and I went with the 6. I'm just wearing them around the house right now to wear them in a bit but they are great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

product_meta.title: Converse Unisex Adults’ CTAS Lift Ox Black White Trainers
product_meta.description: Typical Converse trainers with double stacked rubber sole
